statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{10.43}; top has length \displaystyle{7.22}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{9.11} and \displaystyle{8.66}. The height is \displaystyle{8.65}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{7.22}+{8.66}+{10.43}+{9.11}={35.42}.
